text.section:
To apply for a physical therapy license, an applicant shall:
Submit to the Board:
An application on the form that the Board requires;
Evidence of completion of:
Any other document that the Board requires; and
Pay to the Board the application fee set by the Board.

To apply for a physical therapist assistant license, an applicant shall:
Submit to the Board:
An application on the form that the Board requires;
Evidence of completion of:
Any other document that the Board requires; and
Pay to the Board the application fee set by the Board.
